title: Zibu & Zizo
author: Andrag Versfeld Nsibande
description: This depicts a pair of twins who look alike but have distinct interests, conveying that "differences are beautiful."

title: What's Next?
author: Beech Botha Williams
description: This portrays energetic Fatima and her loving Grandpa as they embrace playful adventures and everyday moments with joy, capturing the spirit of curiosity in every new day.

title: The Box
author: Retief Smith Kliphuis
description: This imaginative tale transforms a simple box into a portal for creative play, encouraging children to see ordinary objects in extraordinary ways.

title: Tikky! Boom! Tish!
author: Wilson Kriel Puren
description: This book invites children into a vibrant world of rhythm and sound, where playful onomatopoeia sparks joyful movement and interactive fun.

title: Senzo & the Sun
author: Le Roux Longland McGregor
description: This engaging story follows a curious boy's day, blending vivid sound effects and simple routines into an exploration of everyday wonders.

title: Alex's Super Medicine
author: Jenkins Rex Van Der Merwe
description: This book presents a young boy’s humorous adventure in overcoming his dislike for medicine through creative, unexpected tactics.

title: How do you Sleep?
author: Demertzis Awerbuck Latimer
description: This playful tale explores the quirky ways different animals sleep, inviting children to mimic each unique style.

title: Joanna’s Grannies
author: Garisch Bolland Campbell
description: This story celebrates the warmth of having two very different but equally loving grandmothers.

title: Let's Be Friends!
author: Hunter Bosman Combrinck
description: This engaging narrative follows the ups and downs of making new friends through playful interactions and encouraging persistence.

title: Look Up!
author: Nel Thorpe
description: This book invites children to explore the wonders above, sparking curiosity about the natural world in a simple, vivid way.

title: Meerkat Magic
author: Kuijers Cleghorn Shongwe
description: This lively tale captures the fun and adventure of meerkats as they explore, run, and climb together.

title: Sam's Treasures
author: Jon Keevy
description: This enchanting story recounts a park adventure where Sam discovers unexpected treasures, blending whimsy with heartfelt discovery.
